detailsSection: Understand the capabilities of Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) technology and learn how to develop WPF-powered smart client applications using the right tools and technique. You will be able to witness how a simple Windows user interface can be transformed into visually appealing one with the use of WPF styling, control templates, and bitmap effects. This session also covers other WPF capabilities such as data binding, text rendering with simple-to-understand demonstrations.
